titles.title: A resolution commending the Louisiana State University Tigers football team for winning the 2003 Bowl Championship Series national championship game.
A resolution commending the Louisiana State University Tigers football team for winning the 2003 Bowl Championship Series national championship game.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends the Louisiana State University Tigers football team for winning the 2003 Bowl Championship Series national championship game.
